name: Re[rol]load
description:
Re[rol]load

In Re[rol]load, your weapon is determined by the power of the dices. In this fast action shooter game, you will have to defend against enemies using what the dices have decided to give you! It could be a rusty shotgun with a ton of recoil, as it could also be a pistol that shoots explosive bullets!

Once you have used all your munitions, you roll the dices to get a new gun.

There are 3 dices: one for the gun type, one for the aim precision and one for the bullet effects. Those 3 parameters combined will give you a unique gun and will force you to adapt every time you empty your ammo stock.

Each bullet effect will act slightly differently depending on the gun.
The game features 5 different guns, 5 precision levels and 12 bullet effects!Some effects might be very powerful, other will simply make your life harder.

This game was submited to the GMTK Game Jam 2022, following the theme "Roll of the dice".

Controls

This game can be played with a keyboard and mouse or a gamepad.

Move: WASD / ZQSD or Left joystick / D-pad
Aim: Mouse or Right joystick
Shoot: R1 / R2 or LMB
